_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The process of living mindfully [sn35.95: When you see a sight with mindfulness
When you hear a sound with mindfulness
When you smell an odor with mindfulness
When you sense a touch with mindfulness
When you know a thought with mindfulness
The process of eroding suffering (a repe: Even as you see a sight and get familiar with how it feels
Even as you hear a sound and get familiar with how it feels
Even as you smell an odor and get familiar with how it feels
Even as you savor a taste and get familiar with how it feels
Even as you sense a touch and get familiar with how it feels
Even as you know a thought and get familiar with how it feels
